attributes.action: stop the dumping of stateles  citizens
attributes.additional_details:
Prime Minister David Cameron

:Stop the dumping of stateless  citizens to other insecure states

 Zimbabweans in UK, have found out that some of their community have fallen victims of an opaque system in deportation as stateless citizens, they are found being dumped in uncivilized states of Africa.

 CASE  :We need answers as to why Agness Nemakonde was forcefully deported to Kenya without proved documents and leading to her death  AS   RESULT  OF FALSE  IMPRISONMENT  AND UNFAIR   DEPORTATION. Nemakonde was imprisoned at Kenya’s Lang’ata Women’s Prison where she fell ill and was admitted to the Kenyatta National Hospital (KNH). Media reports quote the hospital’s public relations officer, Simon Ithae, confirming her death.

YOU YUBE: Stateless woman living in JKIA toilet

 she has been either in police custody or detained at airports in five different countries. Malawi, Zimbabwe Kenya, S.A and UK

 STORY
